fields.description: This company will be set for the Memberships created via webhook.
fields.label: Company

fields.description: When enabled, allows assigning members to chapters and using chapter-based features
fields.label: Enable Chapter Management

fields.description: When enabled, BTW exemption codes will be applied according to Dutch tax regulations
fields.label: Tax Exempt for Contributions and Donations

fields.description: IBAN for direct debit collections
fields.label: Company IBAN

fields.description: BIC code for company's bank
fields.label: Company BIC/SWIFT

fields.description: Dutch Incassant ID for direct debit collections
fields.label: Creditor ID
Default Tax Exemption Type
fields.options:
EXEMPT_NONPROFIT
EXEMPT_MEMBERSHIP
EXEMPT_FUNDRAISING
EXEMPT_SMALL_BUSINESS
OUTSIDE_SCOPE
EXEMPT_WITH_INPUT
EXEMPT_NO_INPUT

fields.description: Check if your organization has applied for the KOR exemption
fields.label: Small Business Scheme (KOR) Applied

fields.description: Skip automatic Payment Entry creation for Membership payments. Warning: May cause accounting issues.
fields.label: Skip Automatic Membership Payment Entries

fields.description: Account for accepting membership payments
fields.label: Membership Payment To

fields.description: Account for accepting donation payments
fields.label: Donation Payment To

fields.description: Skip automatic Payment Entry creation for Donations when marked as paid. Warning: May cause accounting issues.
fields.label: Skip Automatic Donation Payment Entries

fields.description: This company will be set for donations created in the system.
fields.label: Company

fields.description: The user that will be used to create Donations, Memberships, Invoices, and Payment Entries. This user should have the relevant permissions.
fields.label: Creation User

fields.description: The starting number for new member IDs
fields.label: Member ID Starting Number

fields.description: Automatically updated when new member IDs are assigned
fields.label: Last Assigned Member ID

fields.description: Automatically updated when the scheduled member history refresh runs
fields.label: Last Member History Refresh

fields.description: When enabled, BTW exemption codes will be applied according to Dutch tax regulations
fields.label: Tax Exempt for Contributions and Donations

fields.description: This chapter will be treated as the National Board with restricted access
fields.label: National Board Chapter

fields.description: Domain to use for organization email addresses (e.g., members.union.org)
fields.label: Organization Email Domain

fields.description: Email address for member support and contact (used in fee adjustment forms and member communications)
fields.label: Member Contact Email

fields.description: Automatically cancel SEPA mandates when terminating
fields.label: Auto-Cancel SEPA Mandates

fields.description: Automatically end board/committee positions
fields.label: Auto-End Board Positions

fields.description: Send email notifications for termination events
fields.label: Send Notifications

fields.description: This Donation Type will be set for the Donation created via Donation web form entry.
fields.label: Default Donation Type

fields.description: Default donor type for new donors created through donation forms
fields.label: Default Donor Type

fields.description: Minimum donation amount to automatically mark as reportable to Belastingdienst
fields.label: ANBI Minimum Reportable Amount

fields.description: Account for donations earmarked for specific campaigns
fields.label: Campaign Donation Account

fields.description: Account for donations earmarked for specific goals (restricted funds)
fields.label: Restricted Donation Account

fields.description: When enabled, membership application forms will show an income-based contribution calculator
fields.label: Enable Income-Based Calculator

fields.description: Percentage of monthly income to suggest as contribution (default: 0.5%)
fields.label: Income Percentage Rate

fields.description: Text to display with the calculator explaining how contributions are calculated
fields.label: Calculator Description
fields.default: Our suggested contribution is 0.5% of your monthly net income. This helps ensure fair and equitable contributions based on your financial capacity.
